author: MrRump
post_text: March 1, 2018 at 1:54 PM#1Hi,attached is a show file in which a variable is put together and then entered as a readable CMD link in a cue.So far, no solution was found because quotes in quotation marks within a variable did not work.From the development department came this very good workaround.A variable in quotation marks is entered as plain text in the CMD field, e.g.Assign Cue 1 /CMD=$"Name"Filesvariable in quotation marks.show.gz120.92 kB – 201 Downloads

posts.author: Duplicate bentoylight
posts.post_text: March 4, 2018 at 11:19 PM#2setvar $cmd "store exec "addvar $cmd $myvarassign cue 1 /cmd=$"cmd" >> cmd = store exec $myvar

title: Variables in quotation marks
